---
title: "Turning your R code into a blog post"
author: "Adam B. Frank B."
date: 2021-01-13
categories: [blogdown]
image: "blogdown.PNG"
---

If you are interested in embedding R code into a blog post, this presentation will show you how, using the blogdown package. You will also learn how to extend this approach to publish your own ebook using bookdown.

https://www.meetup.com/greater-portland-data-science/events/275333867/
